entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
